toolingEntityParticle.Label: Transaction ID
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__sytxncst_txnid__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: This is the transaction Quantity.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Transaction Qty
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__sytxncst_txnqty__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: This identifies a sub classification for this cost transaction.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Transaction Sub ID
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__sytxncst_txnsubid__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: Cost Transaction, Freight Cost
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Unit Cost, Freight
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__sytxncst_ucstfrght__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: For Labor transactions, this is the actual labor amount incurred, calculated as labor hrs booked x Employee rate. On other transactions, under Std Cost, it is Std Labor Cost; under Weighted Average, it is the avg labor cost at the time of the transaction.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Unit Cost, Lab
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__sytxncst_ucstlab__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: This is the cost of the purchased material for this. Under Standard Cost, this is the Standard Material Cost for the Item; under Average Cost this is the actual cost at the time of the transaction.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Unit Cost, Mtl
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__sytxncst_ucstmtl__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: For labor transactions, this is the actual labor amount incurred x Fringe OHD rate. On other transactions, under Std Cost, it is Std Fringe OHD Cost; under Weighted Average, it is the avg Fringe OHD cost at the time of the transaction.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Unit Cost, Fringe
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__sytxncst_ucstohdfrng__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: For labor transactions, this is the actual labor amount incurred x Labor OHD rate. On other transactions, under Std Cost, it is Std Labor OHD Cost; under Weighted Average, it is the avg Labor OHD cost at the time of the transaction.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Unit Cost, Lab Ohd
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__sytxncst_ucstohdlab__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: For Machine booking transactions, this is the actual machine charge, calculated as Machine time x Machine Rate. On other transactions, under Std Cost, it is Std Machine OHD; under Weighted Average, it is the avg Machine OHD at the time of the transaction.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Unit Cost, Machine
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__sytxncst_ucstohdmach__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: On receipt transactions, this is the actual machine charge, calculated as Material Cost x Material OHD Rate. On other transactions, under Std Cost, it is Std Material OHD; under Weighted Average, it is the avg Material OHD at the time of the transaction.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Unit Cost, Mtl Ohd
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__sytxncst_ucstohdmtl__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: Cost Transaction, Other Indirect Cost
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Unit Cost, Other Landed
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__sytxncst_ucstothlnd__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: On receipt transactions, this is the Subcontract Labor charge for outside processing. On other transactions, under Std Cost, it is Std Sub Labor; under Weighted Average, it is the avg Sub Labor at the time of the transaction.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Unit Cost, Sub Lab
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__sytxncst_ucstsublab__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: On receipt transactions, this is the Subcontract Material charge for Subcontract POs. On other transactions, under Std Cost, it is Std Sub Mtl; under Weighted Average, it is the avg Sub Mtl at the time of the transaction.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Unit Cost, Sub Mtl
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__sytxncst_ucstsubmtl__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: This is the sum of all the individual Unit Cost components for this transaction.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Unit Cost, Total
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__sytxncst_ucsttot__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: This is the Unit Cost Total extended by the transaction quantity.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Unit Cost, Total Ext
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__sytxncst_ucsttotext__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: This is the Mfg User Number of the employee that performed the transaction.
